charaepi_ch0337_00_corusa/2301_1101_0100:
One day, [Name:PlayerNickname ]
spotted Brassius and Juliana chatting.
charaepi_ch0337_00_corusa/2301_1201_0300: I was just chatting with Brassius!
charaepi_ch0337_00_corusa/2301_1201_0400:
He’s a Gym Leader from Paldea who
specializes in Grass-type Pokémon.
And he’s an artist!
charaepi_ch0337_00_corusa/2301_1201_0500:
That I am. And this is my partner Pokémon,
Sudowoodo!
charaepi_ch0337_00_corusa/2301_1201_0600:
As you can see, he’s been honed by the art
of Pokémon battles.
charaepi_ch0337_00_corusa/2301_0401_0800:
Your expression overflows with curiosity...
Very well! Allow me to explain!
charaepi_ch0337_00_corusa/2301_0402_1000:
Do you not understand? Then I shall impart
you with some wisdom!
charaepi_ch0337_00_corusa/2301_1201_1100:
My Sudowoodo Terastallizes into Grass
type during battle...and I consider this
an act of art!
charaepi_ch0337_00_corusa/2301_1201_1200: Although Sudowoodo may look like a tree...
charaepi_ch0337_00_corusa/2301_1201_1300:
its composition is closer to rock than
vegetation. It merely mimics a tree!
charaepi_ch0337_00_corusa/2301_1201_1400: Thus, it isn’t fond of water.
charaepi_ch0337_00_corusa/2301_1201_1500:
However! By Terastallizing, it no longer
needs to rely on mimicry! It can become
a true Grass-type Pokémon!
charaepi_ch0337_00_corusa/2301_1201_1700:
The aggression! The elegance! It all comes
together to form a masterpiece!
charaepi_ch0337_00_corusa/2301_1201_1900:
When you look at Pokémon battles as a
whole, they look like art.
charaepi_ch0337_00_corusa/2301_1201_2000:
Moves are exchanged, flowing into each
other. Shifting colors, shaking emotions...
charaepi_ch0337_00_corusa/2301_1201_2100: Each battleground is like an artist’s atelier!
charaepi_ch0337_00_corusa/2301_1201_2200:
As an artist, once I am in an atelier,
I simply can’t sit still!
charaepi_ch0337_00_corusa/2301_1201_2300: Brassius... Does that mean what I think?
charaepi_ch0337_00_corusa/2301_1201_2400:
Indeed. My muses sing to me! I am filled
with the desire to create!
charaepi_ch0337_00_corusa/2301_1201_2500:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]! Would you
battle me now? Let us turn this battleground
into our atelier!
charaepi_ch0337_00_corusa/2301_1201_2600:
Then, you can show me your art and the
feelings you pour into it!
charaepi_ch0337_00_corusa/2301_1201_2700:
I assume you are ready? Let our
collaborative work of art begin!
